TopicTitle: My version of the Orion test flight

Articles.Content:
I made a simple Imgur album of the Orion flight launched the 5 december 2014. I know the titles are in french, it was to show it to my friends. I put the traduction in the description .

I tried to follow the real orders of events, nonetheless i'm pretty proud of myself.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The mods i used : FAR, DRE, Astronomer's pack, Aerojet Kerbodyne, KW Rocketry, Realchute, Hot Rocket. I did it with my main KSP file so I have a bunch of other mods, but those are the most important to note. Yes, I didn't use RSS, so Kerbin is not scaled properly.

I hope you enjoy it!!!

Ah, very cool. I was following the success of that flight during break at school. With the success of that flight, America is getting closer to getting back into space on our own rockets, not Russia's.
